summary: As a boy, filmmaker James Cameron dreamed of a journey to the deepest part of the ocean. This film is the dramatic fulfillment of that dream.
cast: James Cameron|Suzy Amis|Paul Henri|Frank Lotito|Lachlan Woods
director: Directors: John Bruno, Ray Quint | 1 more credit »
title: James Cameron: Desafío en las profundidades 3D
